Title: 夢十夜

----

Title-ruby: 

<ruby><rb>夢</rb><rt>ゆめ</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>十夜</rb><rt>じゅうや</rt></ruby>

----

Title-english: Ten Nights' Dreams

----

Author: <ruby><rb>夏目</rb><rt>なつめ</rt></ruby><ruby><rb>漱石</rb><rt>そうせき</rt></ruby>

----

Author-english: Natsume Sōseki

----

Blurb: Ten dreams, ranging from a humorous all too long love commitment, to a mother’s enduring care for her children and husband.

----

Level: Advanced

----

Premium: true

----

Text:

    「だから<ruby id='1081' data-dictionary-id='1771' data-english='(1) to bear ･ to carry on one&#39;s back (2) to take responsibility for ･ to accept a duty (3) to be injured (4) to owe' data-locations='1081,1083' data-fluency='5'><rb>負って</rb><rt>おぶって</rt></ruby>やるから<ruby id='1082' data-dictionary-id='509' data-english='(1) good ･ excellent ･ fine ･ nice ･ pleasant ･ agreeable (2) sufficient (can be used to turn down an offer) ･ ready ･ prepared (3) profitable (e.g. deal, business offer, etc.) ･ beneficial (4) OK' data-locations='1035,1055,1082,1494,2093,2774,2826,3813,3988,4157' data-fluency='5'><rb>いい</rb><rt>いい</rt></ruby>じゃないか」
    <br>
    「<ruby id='1083' data-dictionary-id='1771' data-english='(1) to bear ･ to carry on one&#39;s back (2) to take responsibility for ･ to accept a duty (3) to be injured (4) to owe'     「<ruby id='2128' data-dictionary-id='19' data-english='big ･ large ･ great' data-locations='64,142,247,329,960,1348,1385,1466,1735,1856,2072,2128,2203,2462,2495,2989,3074,3240,3462,3500,4027' data-fluency='5'><rb>大きな</rb><rt>おおきな</rt></ruby>もんだなあ」と<ruby id='2129' data-dictionary-id='187' data-english='(1) to say ･ to utter ･ to declare (2) to name ･ to call (3) to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping") ･ to make a noise' data-locations='14,46,59,113,121,138,195,571,580,583,586,593,754,925,969,983,1010,1057,1080,1108,1371,1395,1485,1495,1551,1575,1577,1775,1832,1838,1987,2011,2129,2135,2149,2162,2211,2266,2288,2348,2377,2502,2698,2859,2884,2979,3058,3065,3077,3129,3243,3741,3799,3804,3814,3867,3881,3893,3908,3967,4015,4158,4167' data-fluency='5'><rb>云って</rb><rt>いって</rt></ruby>いる。

    「<ruby id='2130' data-dictionary-id='388' data-english='(1) human being ･ person ･ man ･ mankind ･ humankind (2) character (of a person)' data-locations='581,2119,2130' data-fluency='5'><rb>人間</rb><rt>にんげん</rt></ruby>を<ruby id='2131' data-dictionary-id='1859' data-english='to make ･ to manufacture' data-locations='1475,2131' data-fluency='5'><rb>拵え</rb><rt>こしらえ</rt></ruby>るよりも<ruby id='2132' data-dictionary-id='801' data-english='(1) very ･ greatly ･ much ･ to a large extent ･ quite (2) just about to' data-locations='1656,2132,2172,2885,3931' data-fluency='5'><rb>よっぽど</rb><rt>よっぽど</rt></ruby><ruby id='2133' data-dictionary-id='2051' data-english='to require much effort ･ to be hard to do' data-locations='2133' data-fluency='5'><rb>骨が折れ</rb><rt>ほねが折れ</rt></ruby>るだろう」<ruby id='2134' data-dictionary-id='377' data-english='(1) certainly ･ of course ･ to be sure ･ surely (2) even if ･ no matter (who, what, when, where, why, how) ･ though ･ although (3) without even ･ without so much as (4) at the (least, earliest, etc.) (5) also (called) (6) emphatic particle' data-locations='58,2110,2134,2234,2236,2931' data-fluency='5'><rb>とも</rb><rt>とも</rt></ruby><ruby id='2135' data-dictionary-id='187' data-english='(1) to say ･ to utter ･ to declare (2) to name ･ to call (3) to go (e.g. "the alarm went ping") ･ to make a noise' data-locations='14,46,59,113,121,138,195,571,580,583,586,593,754,925,969,983,1010,1057,1080,1108,1371,1395,1485,1495,1551,1575,1577,1775,1832,1838,1987,2011,2129,2135,2149,2162,2211,2266,2288,2348,2377,2502,2698,2859,2884,2979,3058,3065,3077,3129,3243,3741,3799,3804,3814,3867,3881,3893,3908,3967,4015,4158,4167' data-fluency='5'><rb>云って</rb><rt>いって</rt></ruby>いる。
    <br>
    　そうかと<ruby id='2136' data-dictionary-id='295' data-english='(1) to think ･ to consider ･ to believe (2) to think (of doing) ･ to plan (to do) (3) to judge ･ to assess ･ to regard (4) to imagine ･   page_text: |
